> [p2p](#comment_13_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): zeronet polls other nodes for a site's new contents?

If you start your ZeroNet client then its asks some peers for the modifications.

If someone creates a new modification then he/she sends it to 5 peers, after they downloaded the changed files these 5 peers also sends to other 5 and so on. So after the startup there is no need to ask changed files becase it will be pushed to your client.

There is only one exception: ZeroNet detects if your computer come back from sleep and acts as on startup and ask for modifications.
